definition: to run off the track/to step out of line/to overstep the bounds of propriety
generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more
course/path/track/rail

sentences.english: His escapades are beginning to drive me crazy.
sentences.chinese: 他的越轨行为快让我疯了。

sentences.english: The formation of the impermissible behavior has subjective and objective causes.
sentences.chinese: 形成越轨行为的因素主要有主观和客观两个方面。

sentences.english: All of the aberration behavior, which  happened on the students of the university,have been punished.
sentences.chinese: 那所大学里学生的所有越轨行为都受到了处罚。

sentences.english: All that misbehavior of those students should be punished in that universiry.
sentences.chinese: 那所大学里学生的所有越轨行为都受到了处罚。

sentences.english: All those students who behaved misbehaviors in that university were punished.
sentences.chinese: 那所大学里学生的所有越轨行为都受到了处罚。

sentences.english: The phenomenon of the student"selecting school" in the large and medium cities of our country belongs to the socialimpermissible behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 我国大中城市的学生“择校”现象属社会越轨行为。

sentences.english: Never has there been such unbridled license among the scholars.
sentences.chinese: 学子们这样的越轨行为真是见所未见。

sentences.english: He said you got out of line.
To write and publish this poem was a daring, transgressive act.
sentences.chinese: 创作并发表这首诗是一个大胆越轨的举动。

sentences.english: Actually, academic misconduct lies in the interaction of all these relationships.
sentences.chinese: 学术越轨实际上就存在于这诸种关系的互动中。

sentences.english: He is a very reliable person he has never gone off the rails .
sentences.chinese: 他这人十分可靠，从来不越轨逾矩。

definition: to overstep the bounds of what is proper/to take sth too far/(of a measuring device) to go off the scale
derailment (railway accident)/to leave the rails/fig. to overstep bounds/fig. to have an extramarital affair
lit. the red apricot tree leans over the garden wall (idiom)/fig. a wife having an illicit lover
to carry on a clandestine love affair
extramarital
sexual relations/sexual contact/intercourse
personal considerations/love affair
extramarital affair
illicit sexual relations
to cheat on one's spouse/to have an affair
improper/presumptuous/assuming/overstepping one's bounds/also written 非份[fei1 fen4]
offending public morals (idiom)
see 婚外情[hun1 wai4 qing2]
licentious/wanton/morally unrestrained
married woman
to break the law and violate discipline (idiom)
